scripts.pre:report: shx mkdir -p allure-results/history && shx cp -r allure-report/history/* allure-results/history || true
scripts.report:allure: npm run pre:report && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:base: npm run clean:allure && npm run cucumber -- --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter --format-options "{\"resultsDir\":\"allure-results\"}"
scripts.test:ci:ui: cross-env ENV=qa NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" cucumber-js --config cucumber.cjs --tags "@ui"
scripts.test:ui:qa: cross-env ENV=qa npm run test:base -- --tags "@ui" && npm run report:allure || npm run report:allure
scripts.test:api:qa: cross-env ENV=qa npm run test:base -- --tags "@api" && npm run report:allure || npm run report:allure
scripts.test:all:qa: cross-env ENV=qa npm run test:base -- --tags "@api or @ui" && npm run report:allure || npm run report:allure
scripts.test:full:cycle: npm run generate:models && npm run test:all:qa
